title: 20mins Leavebuster
body: Hello, I don't know why I got a Leavebuster. For the past few games, I have emergancy so I have to afk. I don't understand why am I get 20 mins Leavebuster?

replies.body:
A Leaverbuster penalty is added to an account after it has exhibited a *recent trend of disconnections*. We understand that emergencies come up, which is why a *single disconnection* can't land you under a penalty timer, but if you continuously leave matches, it can result in a queue timer. You can find out more about this system by reading through our [**Leaverbuster FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Let me know if you have any questions.
